title: Simulation-Based Science Education Design Utilizing Dynamic Quality Attributes

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level theoretical knowledge in science and basic experimental skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based VR simulation for practical science education targeting professional practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze dynamic quality attributes (integration-distinction, stability-flexibility, consistency-diversity) and apply them to simulation design.
Learners can select optimal combinations of quality attributes for expertise-based scientific problem-solving in VR environments.
Learners can adjust the balance of quality attributes in simulation learning design based on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
